Reviews.Title: Nice phone with limitations for US T-Mobile users
Reviews.Author: Paul S. Remington
Reviews.Content: The Samsung S3 Mini is a lite version of the Samsung S3 smartphone.  It sports a smaller 4” screen with a resolution of 480x800 and is an entry-level phone compared to the more pricy and feature-packed S3.  This phone does not support 4G, which is curious since the S3 does.  It supports 2G and 3G, as long as it works well with your carrier.And this is the part of the review where I state a friendly warning.  The vendor selling this phone states the phone is compatible with GSM carriers, such as AT&T; and T-Mobile.  This may not be entirely true.I purchased this phone while setting up service with T-Mobile here in the US.  I wanted an unlocked phone that my wife could use with our new service.  The vendor sent us a Samsung S3 Mini “Orange” phone that originated in Europe and had European firmware installed on it.  While the phone worked fine and upgraded itself properly, we were never able to get any speeds more than 2G with a data speed of about 100Kbps, which is painfully slow.  The smartphone was unable to host any smooth streaming media due to this slow bandwidth.I then learned that the phone does not support the US T-Mobile 3G transmission frequencies.  It will work with T-Mobile, but only at 2G speeds.  If you live in the US and plan to use this phone with T-Mobile as your carrier, expect only to use 2G service.  This may be fine for some people.  If it is, this phone is worth considering.The charger is an international charger that comes with a North American adapter.  The phone comes with a pair of headphones and a battery.  It does not come with an SD card, case, or protective cover, as is typical with cell phones in general.We were able to return the phone and get our money back from Amazon.  Amazon is very good about returns.  While this phone didn’t work for us and it was advertised to work with AT&T; and T-Mobile, in fairness to the vendor who sold it, they also do say that “not all carrier features may be supported.”  You're best to take this into consideration before purchasing this phone.

Those who bought advise you to remove the battery and check if they have the yellow triangle, but check or by an authorized Samsung store to surprise me is that I di den. I bought it through my friend Jose who made the purchase and so I could not claim such a scam. I hope Amazón investigate each case and discard those scammers page

I didn't want a contract, and I didn't like the phones I was seeing on pay as you go plans. The company we are with only charges $10 for a second person and we wanted to stay with them. I needed an ATT compatible phone. This one fits me perfectly! I have had no problems what so ever. Being it is my first smartphone, I only wish it came with a better users manual. I have a 25 year old daughter, so I am burdening her with questions. lol

Reviews.Title: Samsung S3 mini works great (in the Bahamas, BTC's network)
Reviews.Author: Ran1017
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace my first Android that went bad due to charging issues.  The size is 4 inches, everything can be seen on the screen clearly, and the setup was easy.  Once you have the apn info setup, in my case I got it from BTC (calling or checking the website), and turned on my data plan, and the phone connected to the 4G data network.  It came with Jelly Bean OS, and it works like a charm.I've had it since July 2013, and it's now September 2013, and up to now I've had no issues.  Overall performance is great, having a memory card is a must, so please order one same time if you don't have one already because the phone doesn't come with one.  Call sound quality is excellent.Explore the features when you get yours and find out what all fun stuff it can do.  You won't regret it - if you want a smaller phone, but still an up-to-date smart phone, this is a good option for you.  And with the price dropping every day the only thing you're missing out on is having yours.  Hurry!

Reviews.Title: Great -- until it died 10 days later...
Reviews.Author: Fried Wonton "FW"
Reviews.Content: Perfect size.  The phone works really well on a T-mobile network.  No speed issues so far.  Call quality is great.  I just wish the speaker phone were louder.EDIT:  I have to change my review to 1 star.  I received my phone around May 5.  By May 15 (10 days later), it was dead.  As in, Sudden Death Syndrome that the Galaxy S3's are notorious for.  It's a shame.  I really loved this phone.  It never got wet or dropped.  I was in the middle of texting when it cut off.  I'm a pretty technical person who does a lot of diy repairs successfully, so I do a lot of troubleshooting and research before throwing in the towel.  I didn't think it was the battery since it still had some power left, but I tried to charge it anyway overnight.  It did not even charge.  Couldn't do a thing; not even do a hard reboot or any of the other tricks I read.  It would not even turn on.  I highly doubt it was a bad battery, either, judging from what I've read about sudden death syndrome.The repair for this kind of damage would be to replace the mainboard (motherboard), and even then, if that new mainboard uses the same defective chip, the same thing will happen.  So I decided it was not financially worth it to invest in its repair.I still love Samsung and stand by their products overall.  This is the first time I've had issue with their products.  Just be aware that if you're in the U.S., you will get little to no support from our U.S. tech support if it crashes.  You can not send this to a U.S. repair place. It will have to go to a UK repair place, at your risk and expense.  Always a risk with buying international phones.  But I've had good luck with my other unlocked european phone -- the Samsung Galaxy i5500 Corby.  Had it for the last 2 years, and I'm still using it for our other cell phone line that stays home.  Besides it being slow (which was expected, as it was a cheap smartphone), it never caused problems.That said, I sucked it up and went for the Samsung Galaxy S5 from my carrier.  At least if the same thing happens, I will have full support.  Overall, AVOID THIS MODEL AT ALL COSTS!

Reviews.Title: I would recommend this seller

Reviews.Content: Phone seems to be new and I have not had any problems with it. Great price. I would recommend this seller. I am using it on Straighttalk and it works great.

Reviews.Title: Awesome form factor
Reviews.Author: rpv
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful and lightweight alternative to its bigger cousins. I used for sometime and I could not find anything wrong. Obviously if you play racing car games or Temple Run Brave, one can notice a little slowness, it is absolutely great for normal uses of navigation, running, as a music player, as a twitter client etc.The S3 Mini comes with a 4-inch Super AMOLED WVGA resolution display (800x480 pixels). It is called mini, but few years ago this probably is a mega. While less pixel factors than the 4.8-inch Galaxy S3, the Mini has 233  ppi where S3 has 305.96 ppi, the Mini's screen resolution is still well within range for a 4-inch screen. Memory can be increased easily and in a very cheap way with a microSD card. Card slot microSD, up to 32 GB.Highly recommend. I am looking for when S4 mini comes in!

ProductInfo.Features:
This Unlocked Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G Network 850/900/1800/1900 MHz frequencies and 3G Network HSDPA 900/1900/2100MHz frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
4.0" Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen, 480 x 800 pixels; Android 4.1 Jelly Bean; Bluetooth; GPS with A-GPS support and GLONASS; Novato U8420 Chipset; CPU Dual-core 1 GHz and MicroSD Car slot up to 32 GB.
5 MP Camera 2592x1944 pixels, autofocus, LED flash; VGA Secondary Camera; Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n, DLNA, Wi-Fi Direct, Wi-Fi hotspot; Dropbox (50 GB storage); MP3/MP4 Player; Google Apps; Document editor; TV-out (MHL A/V link) and Image/video editor.
Talk time Up to 14 h 10 min (2G)/Up to 7 h 10 min (3G) - Standby Up to 450 h (2G)/Up to 430 h (3G)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-i8190 Galaxy S3 Mini 3G 900/1900/2100 factory Unlocked International Verison WHITE
